Negative_Review: I have been there for 5 nights start from 4 July 2017 I booked two rooms and it was nice and overpriced the hotel location is near Catalonia plaza and ramblas street breakfast is below average breakfast staff was rude although I stayed for 5 nights and I did not see them smiling room service was poor stay again NO
Positive_Review: location

The staff on check in were very friendly and helpful We had booked a separate room for our teenage sons and had requested a twin close to our room as they didn t have a twin room available they upgraded us to junior suites so they could be adjacent to us and use the sofa bed as the second bed very thoughtful The pool and outdoor sun deck although small was perfect to chill on after a day walking around the city They also have a buffet selection of hot and cold snacks available for free from 2pm 11pm a very nice touch The hotel is in a perfect location for sightseeing etc

Negative_Review: Overall very satisfied except about one staff We wanted to book a taxi to the airport at 6 00 am the next day The staff asked our room number and said ok without making any notes He said he would take care of it later Yet at night time when we came back to the hotel we reconfirmed with the counter staff about our booking To our surprise it was not done
Positive_Review: Excellent locations for guests who will join local tours as easy access to gathering points

Negative_Review: Tea water was either stale or just not warm a really bad cup of tea
Positive_Review: Food was good but tea needs to be hot when you make it for drinking Apple cake was very nice

Negative_Review: I wish I had the option of one smaller pillow instead of the long ones I wish that we had more options for lights lamps other than the one master switch
Positive_Review: Staff is excellent very helpful and able to answer questions for us we have been to Barcelona 8 times and know it well Room is comfortable Food is excellent Location is great so near the Metro and airport shuttle

Negative_Review: For people with young children 2 elevators may be tricky
Positive_Review: Snacks throughout the afternoon and evening and such lovely staff always smiling and helpful Breakfast is until noon which allows you to have a lie in Wonderful Juan on the front desk was so great Thank you

Negative_Review: The cleaning lady forgot to change our bath towels once the dirty towels wee left on the ground I wish the mini bar is open to everyone so we can take what we want like Catalonia Square 4 up
Positive_Review: Staff is really nice and friendly Room is classic I love the wood floor Pool is small but clean the garden is very cute The breakfast is a bit pricy but the quality is good We had a great time there

In the hotel there is a snack bar where you can the whole day eat and drink The food was just perfect like the breakfast We love it The hotel have an amazing swimming pool to relax by yourself or with the kids And the personal is so kind and helpful We recommend this hotel and will def come back

Negative_Review: Money minded Preauthorised my card to times even before my stay first thing on check in they expect me to pay in full
Positive_Review: Location central Near aerobus stop

Everything The staff were excellent the breakfast was good the tapas available all afternoon and evening was a really useful treat and very generous the room was comfortable with good airconditioning the wifi was fast And the location outstanding All perfect

Negative_Review: The only one small thing was the sink in the room was outside the bathroom seemed odd to us to have to walk outside bathroom to wash hands
Positive_Review: Friendly staff willing to help great location and very comfortable I took my Mum who was 85 with me and they looked after us both very well
Great location for the city centre friendly helpful staff cleanliness comfort great free snacks in the afternoon Met all our needs

STAFF WAS THE BEST WENT OUT OF THEIR WAY TO ACCOMMODATE ALL REQUESTS EVEN WALKED US TO THE BUS STOP WITH AN UMBRELLA BECAUSE OF THE WEATHER GREAT LOCATION AND JUST STEPS TO THE AIRPORT BUS STOP WOULD TOTALLY RECOMMEND THIS HOTEL

Negative_Review: Could not fault this hotel one of the best I have stayed in
Positive_Review: The staff are without exception friendly and most helpful The whole ambience of the hotel is excellent The buffet available from 2pm till late evening is an amazing bonus

From its street appearance you would not expect much from this property The street frontage is small and unpretentious Once you are inside you are in for a surprise Our room was spacious and had two balconies The walk in shower was luxurious An unexpected bonus was the free buffet they put out from 2 to 11 p m but the best part was the attentiveness of the staff We had planned to meet a tour guide in the Plaza Catalonia but we were unsure about how to identify him so the bellboy actually walked with us to the plaza and found our guide in the crowd of people in this very busy plaza

Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful Excellent location Shopping and Metro stations all within easy walking distance The snacks are an amazing selection salads sandwiches juices coffees desserts etc all for no extra charge

From the moment I called to confirm reservation and spoke with Kenya front desk I knew our stay here would be wonderful She was friendly and a true professional Questions never bothered anyone at the hotel as we learned how to make our way around Barcelona We arrived after 9 pm from the airport and were greeted by Joan a vibrant young man We were helped to our room by Alex and Xavier bell hops who were friendly and took the time to show us around the hotel and explained their wonderful 11 am 11 pm snack area where we assisted by Fabian waiter On subsequent days we were assisted with where to go for great restaurants how to get there using the train or subway by Raul Juan Carlos and Alejo Everyone at Catalonia Square went above and beyond to assure we had the most memorable vacation in Barcelona I would strongly recommend this hotel again if for no other reason than to get to know and enjoy the amenities location and the STAFF I cannot say enough kind complimentary words to describe everyone at the hotel

Negative_Review: Very hard to fault this property
Positive_Review: Perfect location a few steps from Plaza Catalunya Balcony room has great view and individual plunge pool option is a bonus Free snacks and drinks available Staff were extremely warm and helpful

Negative_Review: Barcelona was very crowded we felt like we were in time square
Positive_Review: The staff was wonderful they met us when we arrived by taxi and made us feel we were visiting family we took the hop on hop off bus you can switch lines using the same ticket The breakfast 20 euros was well worth it The rooms are clean and spacious the biggest shower with a rain show head was amazing Free snacks served after 2 all day yes free that s mini sandwiches yogurts fruit soft drinks tea and coffee There is a small swimming pool and a lovely area to sit outside You will not be disappointed

Negative_Review: Views were poor pool was not a real rooftop and small with five chaises No chaise on our terrace While breakfast was good it could be had for a fraction of the price outside the hotel
Positive_Review: staff was superb We had a suite so room and terrace were spacious Shower was great Location very good
The staff aretention friendly and helpful The location is excellent the comfort cleanliness WiFi and other amenities were perfect
Hotel was great in every aspect location cleanliness and service The staff are commendable They made us feel right at home by attending to our needs and requests in the best way they could
Modern hotel in excellent location near Plaza Catalunya yet away from the crowds Afternoon free snacks a bonus excellent breakfast and friendly and welcoming staff Would definitely stay here again

Negative_Review: Sometimes it was a bit noisy as the doors of the rooms slam hard and loud
Positive_Review: It has everything and and more Attention to small details and staff were really helpful
I just love this hotel All the staff are wonderful and you feel like a special guest in their home I really appreciate the generous snack buffet available from 2pm

Very modern and elegant hotel the staff were extremely helpful and friendly The snack lounge available for all hotel guests is very spacious and relaxing with good food the room are clean with comfortable beds the location was excellent close to the metro stations and to passeig de Gracia

Staff were amazing so helpful and friendly We had two junior suites next to each other for our family trip which worked very well Large rooms well equipped and very clean Free afternoon buffet was fantastic especially arriving back after a day in the city The location couldn t be better We especially liked wandering around the main square in the evening very relaxing The hotel is also brilliantly located for shopping either independent or designer brands as well as all of the amazing cultural experiences on offer

This was our 2nd stay at the hotel and we are still very happy with our experience Joan Kenia Diego and Rachid made sure of that The manager at that time I didn t get his name allowed us a late check out until our car pick up service arrived at 5 30pm The service of the hotel is above and beyond Highly recommended

Negative_Review: Yoghurt and milkshake could be stored in cooler as they got warm from when put out
Positive_Review: Excellent location for everything we did and nice to get home each day to buffet snacks thank you

Negative_Review: A very personal thing but room too dark for me I am not keen on seductive low lighting I did not like just having sheets instead of a quilt It was cold in April but there were blankets
Positive_Review: The hotel was very clean decorated beautifully The buffet was a great buffet after walking the city all day Bathroom and facilities good Staff very helpful and pleasant Excellent position for sightseeing

Negative_Review: Nespresso machine in our room was disgustingly dirty So much dust in the room we had no blankets just a light sheet of fabric
Positive_Review: The location was amazing The idea of the snack bar was a plus too

Negative_Review: Room layout was not ideal as previous stay Wash basin was located outside bathroom only
Positive_Review: great location can save time and cost of transportation multi mobile charging tool on bedside was very convenient good amenities complementary bottled water bathrobe slippers and toothbrush

Negative_Review: I stayed here for the third time so I expected a more warm meeting I arrived an early morning and I asked if I could take a breakfast while I was waiting for check in I could it for extra payment During my stay the staff looked at me as if my presence caused them indigestion I think it was my last visit to the hotel
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The main week point of the hotel is by far its bathroom If it s not for the bathroom I would have given it a perfect 10 The bathroom has glass walls O O It was very very weird Too much intimacy and embarrassment The glass door isn t fully shut no lock no real door frame which means you can hear everything that s going on inside Also you can t take a shower or go to the bathroom without your partner in the room seeing you Of course that s a vague image and not a completely clear glass but still very weird and embarrassing Also if you want to go to the bathroom at night and you turn on the light you are in fact light up the entire room and for people like me that sleep lightly it s a deal breaker Every time my wife wanted to go to the bathroom she had to wake me up because of the light Other than that the hotel is amazing I wish for them they would change this weird setup of a bathroom That s for me the main reason for not recommending anybody to go there and it s such an amazing hotel besides that That s such a shame
Positive_Review: The Catalonia Square is an absolute amazing hotel Greatly located right near by Plaza De Catalunya and the metro stop Also it s very accessible from the airport using the Aerobus The staff was really nice and helpful And the free buffet in the lobby that includes all sorts of foods sandwiches salads cakes coffee tea all sorts of cold beverages etc was really good

Negative_Review: We didn t want to leave 10 10 stay
Positive_Review: Junior sweet with pool was amazing Spacious bright room Lots of extras The free buffet is brilliant lots of selection The hotel is spotlessly clean

Staff go out of their way to make your stay enjoyable Lovely extra touches like free bottled water in room and free snacks from 5 11pm from bar Also good business assistance like printing documents etc

Negative_Review: First night only decaffeinated coffee in room second night no coffee at all
Positive_Review: Super position beds very comfy employees very smily and helpful free very good snacks all afternoon

Negative_Review: Nothing I recommend to purchase Barcelona Visitors Pass that allows free access to museums buses
Positive_Review: Location is excellent Customer Service was excellent I would recommend this hotel It is well worth the money We arrived late but the front office staff came out and got our bags right up to the room right away

Negative_Review: Nothing that we can think of
Positive_Review: The room was very nice and clean with enough space and good bed Location perfect good bed and breakfast and snack bar open all day We highly recommend this hotel and would stay there again

The staff was very helpful The free afternoon night buffet was amazing Catalonia Square is walking distance to most things in the city and this hotel is an upscale modern facility on a very pleasant street

Best accommodation we had through our Europe tour the rooms were spacious and absolutely comfortable the bathroom was amazing the snacks offered during the day were absolutely delicious and an added bonus will definitely recommend this hotel as well as a perfect location to amenities excellent and helpful staff always at your beck and call My kids did not want to leave the hotel will definitely be back here
Great and convenient location in the middle of everything and right next to the metro with friendly and helpful staff and rooms that are clean and well maintained

Negative_Review: The housekeeping staff r a bit noisy rough when cleaning other rooms especially when closing the doors vaccuming Room Service needs improvement attention proper menus
Positive_Review: I liked the warmth of the staff as well as there willingness to help out The Jr Suite we booked was spacious nice

Location was excellent and central to all the main attractions Front desk staff were really helpful and friendly A nice touch was the fruit plate and cava brought to our room on arrival and the turn down service in the evenings We also enjoyed the convenience of the snack bar especially as we were travelling with a toddler

Great location friendly staff and nice room with a feee upgrade The free snacks in the afternoon were also an added bonus On arrival the staff showed us where we were on a map and a pretty detailed description of the surrounding area A very pleasant stay

Negative_Review: Price was a little high and had to put out two little ones in a separate room
Positive_Review: Everything was perfect From the AMAZING staff to the clean beautifully decorated nicely located facilities it made our vacation worth every penny

Negative_Review: There was not a thing I didn t like every thing was excellent
Positive_Review: The location was excellent the rooms were spotless they were cleaned every time we got out the staff were very very helpful and excellent to talk to over all the hotel was very welcoming I would stay there again and again
We received very warm host The reception people are so kind to tell you everything you need in details They are very helpful The room is clean and tidy

Negative_Review: Could m not say anything bad about the hotel
Positive_Review: Very clean and friendly good central location would definitely recommend this hotel to any one they offer a free snack during the day make sure you take advantage of it saves u having a large meal after

Negative_Review: Breakfast was fairly expensive 19 per person Given the high standard of everything else in the room the sheets felt remarkably cheap and not particularly comfortable We had a junior suite which was laid out somewhat oddly the toilet and shower opened directly onto the main room meaning very little privacy not a problem for a married couple but still potentially awkward for others
Positive_Review: Location was phenomenal No problems with noise despite being on a major street in a heavily trafficked part of town Staff very friendly and eager to help even late at night Breakfast was delicious Spacious room with free water every day Hotel has free snacks sandwiches cookies fruit etc available from late morning until late at night every day amazing little perk and great for tiding one over until late Spanish dinners Would be delighted to stay here again

Negative_Review: Rooms are a bit tiny as common in Barcelona
Positive_Review: Free snack buffet and open use printer was a nice touch Location is superb connected to everywhere Got a complementary welcome dessert upon arrival and chocolates on bed every night All members of staff were super friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: A little quiet could have music little louder in the eating area would have loved a cappuccino only coffee but otherwise excellent
Positive_Review: Great location close to metro and airport shuttle lively hotel the free snacks were a lovely bonus during the day

Negative_Review: Disabling my room key for no reason on my 2nd day Even entered the room when i was absent due to some sort of security reasons according to their declaration Well they could let me know about it
Positive_Review: Welcoming warm place with nice staff Great location nice room and generous with their snacks bar
Really enjoyed having a small privat pool with a nice view This hotel has a perfect location and has great staff I was feeling home immediately great bathroom and real good beds I will be back soon

Location was fantastic great central location enabling access to everything you d need the aerobus and metro is only a 5 minute walk away If budget will allow I d recommend the Junior Suite with pool great way to relax the legs after walking around the sites

Negative_Review: Breakfast would be better if started earlier perhaps 630 or 7 for early start travellers
Positive_Review: Warm and helpful reception Great facilities clean quiet and comfortable

Negative_Review: First floor a little noisy from underground but room huge
Positive_Review: The friendly service from every member of staff was a total eye opener everyone wanted to help The reception people the breakfast people the housekeeping lady fantastic especially for a solo traveller

Negative_Review: The organization of the bathroom was not comfortable especially the basin being situated in the corridor The all modern style of furniture lacked any drawers
Positive_Review: The location was perfect Staff very friendly and helpful The snack bar was very practical especially at the end of long day tours

Negative_Review: room a little small not a lot of other facilties exercise room limited
Positive_Review: Staff were great location excellent nice afternoon free buffet nice facilities terrace pool

from stepping through the door to leaving the staff make you really welcome and are really helpful the hotel is beautifully clean and the food is of a very high standard we have stayed here before and it never fails to give a fantastic service thankyou

Negative_Review: Room was ok but toiletries like shower gel and shampoo were awful plus they were even stingy with it not replacing a quarter full tiny bottle of shower gel and completely forgetting to replace it on another occasion
Positive_Review: Service staff very friendly and helpful we were allowed early check in and late check out with no fuss Location of hotel is excellent very close to Placa Catulunya and just across from the biggest department store Cortes

The service at check in dining and room service were excellent The staff were extremely courteous and helpful Especially Roger at Front desk Diego and a few at front desk and concierge that I did not get their names Asta in dining room and Judith from room service all very nice I talked to Roger a couple of times before my visit to enquire location and places nearby he was extremely patient Roger was able to able arrange early check in and even upgraded two rooms as I explained to him that I was travelling with my two senior friends at 70 and would be good for them to arrive with a room available in early morning The location of the hotel is extremely convenient Just 5 to 10 minutes walk from the Le Rambla Catalonia Square shopping centres Next to the hotel was a 24 hour grocery store with good fruits snacks toiletries etc there were also a caf and a McDonald At the end of the block is a really good salad bar called Organics Across the street is a huge department store with a taxi stand The hotel also provide a buffet with sandwiches fruits beverages hot soup entr e with vegetables salad cheeses bread yoghurt milk tea and coffee on complimentary from 2 PM to 11 PM every day We were very busy so no time to check on the health club pool and rooftop Book this and you won t regret The owner of the hotel is so lucky to have such a great team

Negative_Review: Can t think of a thing Our kind of hotel Would definitely stay there again
Positive_Review: Modern hotel in an excellent location Comfortable bed and sheets Very quiet Friendly and helpful service Buffet with light meals snacks deserts and coffee cappuccinos available every day between 2pm and 11pm at no charge Wifi worked well Our room was spacious Got an excellent last minute rate through booking com

Negative_Review: Would have liked the bed to be softer
Positive_Review: The entire hotel has a very modern style and is very clean Great location as we visited many of the sites in Barcelona without using a bus or taxi We only took a taxi for the Sagrada Familia and to get to the beach Also the room we were in provided a second door in the entry way of our room that we used at night to help silence any noise by other guests Not sure if the second door was necessary but we never heard any noises from other guests

Negative_Review: Doors are thin you can hear other guests when passing by
Positive_Review: Great location Staff are super friendly clean rooms comfortable beds loved the snack bar and although breakfast is limited and at a cost but it s everything you need to start your day Many thanks Yolanda and Sergio you ve made my trip

Negative_Review: For food sensitive guests they can put food labels about type of meat and other ingredients etc in free snack and breakfast bar
Positive_Review: Location breakfast and free snack bar are perfect It is very close to main attractions

We loved the view of Catalonia square from our end room with a terrace and the close proximity to transport and shops We also loved the availability of free snacks which were light meals you could have in the afternoon until late in the dining room The service was fabulous too Very helpful and accommodating staff

Negative_Review: There was never anyone attending the bar you had to shout and go find the waiter maybe you should put a bell on the bar
Positive_Review: Hotel very clean and staff very friendly

Negative_Review: When I booked I mentioned that it was my partners 40th birthday and asked if they could make even more special but no effort was made regarding that
Positive_Review: The afternoon treats were a very nice touch Also even the standard rooms felt premium Very clean hotel the staff were very friendly

Wouldn t hesitate to recommend it to anyone Best place we stayed in Spain Location excellent and as an added bonus only a couple of minutes walk to the airport bus A very nice extra is the free snacks available from 2 00pm

The complimentary tapas were unexpected but great Never bought dinner Location perfect Upgraded to the best room in the hotel Big and had a vast rooftop view of the Gothic Quarter and Cantalonia Square Breathtaking

Negative_Review: The beautiful pool terrace was in the shade all day and no drinks facility available The pool was icy cold There was MOULD growing on both jugs of lemonade and iced tea in the gym The hot water coffee machine was painfully slow which made the tea lukewarm by the time it had filled the pot The step up and down from our room 702 was very high and in fact dangerous if it was dark or wet The late check out facility could be managed better I asked the question about a late check out on booking the hotel and never received a response When asking at the reception 24 hours before checkout I could not get a yes or no answer Eventually we had checkout at 1pm instead of 12 noon but couldn t confirm this until 9am on the day which isn t very helpful
Positive_Review: Both rooms 404 702 were beautifully clean and well maintained The beds were comfortable although very tightly tucked in making it difficult to get under the covers Afternoon snacks were generous tasty and very welcome Great location for central Barcelona La Rambla shopping tours cafes etc Beach was not so close but cheap in a taxi

Negative_Review: The only negative thing about my stay was the noisy cleaners in the hallway when I had do not disturb sign on There was a staff closet probably supply closet next to my room where they frequently slammed the door and either a mop or a vacuum cleaner kept hitting the walls outside the room Not very considerate
Positive_Review: Location is excellent only a few meters from the Catalunya Square Free buffet from 14 00 24 00 was outstanding never seen anything like that before Room is big nice and clean with great bathroom and staff very friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: Not really a dislike just thought I had booked a room with a balcony that you could sit out on but turned out I should have requested a terrace The hotel would have moved us at a cost but didn t have terraced room with twin beds
Positive_Review: All the staff were extremely helpful and friendly The free snacks drinks everyday were very welcome on returning from long hot days sightseeing Also the clean towels and toiletries twice a day The location is convenient for Plaza Catalunya Las Ramblas and only 7 in taxi to beach

Everything about this hotel was perfect we got a room overlooking Catalonia Square The rooms were very spacious clean and comfortable The inclusive snacks and soft drinks from 2pm until 10pm were fabulous The reception staff where amazing nothing was too much trouble and especially Xavi seemed to go the extra mile
Loved the attention to detail Very clean and spacious room There was turndown service every night Free drinks and snacks in the lobby Perfect central location Friendly staff Would stay here again

Negative_Review: The partition between the bedroom and bath is glass Could be made to provide more privacy
Positive_Review: 1 The staff could not be more gentle knowledgeable and helpful They are an example of professional standards and support in every way 2 The location is ideal right in the centre of town 3 Free of charge refreshments and sandwichesplus crisps and nuts in the loungecwere proof of good hospitality and even generosity

Negative_Review: Checkin Had to wait an full hour for my room after I arrived right at the time checkin was possible The gut at the reception told me about such a busy day while the whole time waiting ONE other couple arrived everything else was really nice
Positive_Review: Great location nice and clean room would definitely recommend this place
Staff very nice and helpfull delicious breakfasts snacks served almost all day location in the center clean rooms speed wifi

Negative_Review: Toilet separate from rest of bathroom
Positive_Review: Coffee machine in the room excellent comfortable beds clean friendly location taxis infront of hotel free snacks all day

Negative_Review: Toilet alone in a bathroom that does not have a shower or sink which are in different locations Strange architectural design but OK I guess
Positive_Review: Location Friendliness Free snacks all day Room space

Negative_Review: Price was a bit high Specially the first night
Positive_Review: Very happy with all Specially with staff Ms Kenia Escalonte was so amazing Very kind and intelligent Responsibility and taking care of us in highly level as much

Negative_Review: somber colours boxed in feeling of both rooms and dining area pool lacks atmosphere and is closed all the time few if any qualities that make it stand out therefore not worthy of a 4 star sup quotation
Positive_Review: excellent location good soundproofing of rooms very clean hotel decent enough free internet

Negative_Review: This property overpriced One of the worst property I ever stayed in the Spain rooms are too small a lot of stuff in the rooms was not working the staff tells you one thing they do another in willing o help I think all the reviews was they put in was fake I do not recommend it to anyone
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: There is a tiny minus the pillows were large and not perfect for sleeping
Positive_Review: I loved this hotel It s located right in the center of Barcelona The hotel is a good 4 The design is nice service is excellent everything is very comfortable Take this hotel price quality is well balanced They upgraded our room for free

The hotel is first class every thing about this hotel was 1st class very well run good free food soft drinks and water pleasant friendly hotel staff and happy to help Especially Miss Kenia from the reception

Negative_Review: The gym could have had some more equipment maybe some weights I am a gym person so I guess I expected a bit more
Positive_Review: The room was lovely with a tiny living room area with sofa seating There were two large televisions in the room Spacious modern and very comfortable

Negative_Review: No complaints about the hotel just some obnoxious guests sharing our same floor
Positive_Review: The staff was very helpful and acommodating Our room was very stylish and had a comfy bed What impressed me most was that while we did have breakfast included in the cost of our room they had a free light buffet for all guests from noon until 8 00p m which we took advantage of Also we had some large luggage with us and they agreed to store 2 of our bags for several days free of charge while we took a short trip north on the train before coming back to Barcelona Great location and great hotel

Negative_Review: Rooms were not sound proof from the inside of the hotel and I could hear guests and staff talking loudly in the corridors It requires 2 elevators to reach the rooms which is an inconvenience I booked a room based on the fact that it had a balcony but unfortunately they had none of those rooms available and with a small additional fee I was upgraded on the 3rd day to a great room
Positive_Review: Hotel was in a great location clean fast wifi and had free snacks through out the day Staff are helpful and friendly Great value for money

Negative_Review: Design of the rooms were nice but bit cold The staff was very friendly but a bit fake You constantly have the feeling that they not trust you Just sit somewhere and they already come to ask your room number Overall good hotel but price quality not so right rather a 3 s rating for my opinion
Positive_Review: Nice rooms Climatisation system was perfect Double windows so no noice from the street Free snacks in the restaurant but due to the attitude of staff it looks like nobody dare to touch it

Negative_Review: Superior rooms with the small 1x1 5 balcony are on a noisy street too loud to open door to balcony The small pool area is on the 1 floor
Positive_Review: Nice boutique hotel Helpful staff Good breakfast and complimentary snack bar from 14 00 till 00 00 Superior room was modern and clean Fast Wifi
Staffs are nice housekeeping very good hotel provide free of charge tea time snack until 11 00 p m Beside hotel a lot of restaurants shops and shopping center They provide welcome fruit and drink

We could not fault this hotel the location was second to none and the staff were so helpful and friendly we particularly liked the extensive choice at breakfast Would recommend this hotel to all our friends

Negative_Review: nothing we will definitely stay in this hotel next time
Positive_Review: Excellent location Super close to rage main tourist area ans metro Free drinks and snacks after 2pm Staff is super helpful We are travelling with my 14 year old boy and they upgraded us to a junior suite without extra charge and the sofa bed is a double bed Room is spacious and clear In all nothing to complain

Negative_Review: Food could be a bit tastier
Positive_Review: I love this hotel 2nd time to stay there Location is great rooms are very clean I am super fussy and the staff is friendly They offer snacks from 2pm 10pm which is a lovely touch to make guests feel welcome

From the moment we arrived the staff at the desk were incredibly warm and helpful The rooms were clean and spacious The pool area was small but had a lot of beds and cushions to lie on there was always room for many others there The location of the hotel is perfect at Catalonia Square There was a wide variety of food offered for breakfast and a lovely range of foods offered from 2pm til at least 8pm We enjoyed our stay at this hotel very much and would highly recommend it to others

Negative_Review: Really can t pinpoint a problem
Positive_Review: Staff consistently friendly polite and courteous Special mention for Roger on front desk charming man an asset to the hotel Made our arrival feel warm and totally welcoming

Negative_Review: Swimming pool only one meter deep and water warm
Positive_Review: Excellent service from hotel staff Great location for walking around Enjoyed free afternoon snacks and beverages

Negative_Review: Can t think of one bad thing to say Staff was super helpful friendly and professional
Positive_Review: Free Smoked Salmon juices pastries eggs meats coffees etc etc etc every morning Free lunch and dinner was even better But the best thing i loved was the free milkshakes every day
If you can afford it then splash out on one of the rooms with a private pool Sitting in a jaccuzi as the sun goes down drinking cava watching the buzz of Barcelona from 7 floors up was sheer bliss
The location of the hotel is superb Every member of staff was welcoming very helpful polite and knowledgeable about the area The hotel is kept very clean We will definitely stay here again

Negative_Review: There wasn t anything we didn t like
Positive_Review: Everything was perfect I have already recommended it to friends I would definitely stay there again

Negative_Review: The only real draw back for us was the pool next door did smell eggy occasionally it wasn t for long and it was fixed but it is a negative to be noted if you were wanting to sit on the balcony for hours it could cause you more of a problem Other than that minor issue the stay was 10 10
Positive_Review: When we arrived we were warmly welcomed the check in was quick and smooth We were taken to our room which was on the 8th floor it was one of only two rooms in the hotel with a balcony this provided the most amazing place to relax at any time of day The view was great and was generally a nice place to sit The size of the room was brilliant plenty of space for us to relax when we weren t out in the city In comparison to other hotels I ve stayed in the features were just that bit better the TV size kettle iron ironing board and the desk area that allowed us to explore the maps for places to visit just made the experience that bit better My main positives would be the proximity we were able to walk to the square in less than a minute this is where the best shops restaurants and travel links were including two metro stations tour buses and taxis unlike other hotels it offered breakfast to 12 00 and then a free buffet from 14 00 00 00 this was great for us as we could grab some food and then relax in the pool The pool was quiet and had it to ourselves most of the time this was also the same for the gym which was very well air conditioned much like the room A real little bit of paradise in the centre of an amazing city i ll be visiting again in the future

Negative_Review: This was the 1st night of a 4 night business trip to Spain It set the standard so high that every hotel I stayed on during the rest of the stay seemed terrible in comparison I do not have a bad word to say about Hotel Catalonia Square
Positive_Review: Such an excellent hotel I really cannot recommend it high enough From the very warm welcome and extremely friendly staff to the luxurious fixtures fittings and complimentary toiletries this place is now my only hotel when staying in Barcelona I don t need to try the best because the perfection of Catalonia Square hotel cannot be surpassed A truly excellent hotel and look forward very much until my next stay here Also David behind the bar makes an excellent Brockmans G T Really must be tried to be believed Keep up the great work Roger David and all the brilliant concierge staff

Negative_Review: Junior suite bathroom design odd to have toilet shower doors opening into the main space not a separate bathroom
Positive_Review: Location ideal for sightseeing or public transport Service friendly professional and extremely helpful Nice modern rooms

Negative_Review: The reception is very small There are limited choices of tv channels The tea and coffee station at the lounge is not always available
Positive_Review: Friendly staff and room cleanliness

Great service team that always willing to help with a smile The rooms are very clean was cleaned twice a day Located in the center close to La rambla passage de gracia and more The hotel located 5 min walk to metro and bus station We enjoyed our stay in the hotel
Extremely helpful and friendly staff hotel in great shape and location Would def reccomend and go back again They deserve all the credit they get

Loved the location Hotel is located in the heart of action and near the Aerobus station at Catalunya Pl and a few metro stations Within walking distance to La Rambla Really appreciate the very clean and modern room My husband and I were allowed early check in and upgraded to junior suite at no extra charge Such goodwill gestures made our day The staff were friendly and helpful Great experience staying at the hotel and looking forward to be back after the Madrid leg of our trip

We received the absolute friendliest welcome we were treated as if we were kings and queens A Full welcome tour and kind offerings to help and assit with everything Snacks all day were a great touch and my favourite of all was having our bedroom prepared for us at night such a great touch Being so Central was very convenient too Thank you if we are ever back you will have our business

We booked a suite and the glass shower was extremely spacious The water pressure was Excellent If you travel to Europe you know that sometimes the water pressure isn t very strong That wasn t the case at this Hotel The guest rooms are very modern and new The property is well taken care of The location is Amazing

Negative_Review: Staff at the breakfast and snack restaurant were not very unfriendly Very stoic and could not care less about their job or the hotel guests who come to eat there We did not like the fact to that breakfast starts at 0730 am No flexibility for travellers who have a train to catch really early We missed breakfast due to this as we have a Renfe Ave train reservation for 0800 However the staff at reception was kind enough to pack us sandwich some fruits orange juice and bottled water Still it was not the same value for the breakfast we paid but it s better than forfeiting it altogether
Positive_Review: Close to everything Metro is a mere 2 3 minute walk Bed and pillows were very comfy The room and bathroom is large We were in the higher floor with a view of Plaza Catalunya and very quiet despite facing the Main Street Getting from the main reception area to our room wa a bit confusing at first but we managed to get used to it The breakfast buffet was very good and the snacks from 2pm 12MN offered free by the hotel was very convenient after a day of walking and sightseeing I would not hesitate to stay here again the next time we are in Barcelona I would like to thank the following staff at reception Aleix Jordin Kenia and two more I can t remember their names They were very friendly and accommodating whenever we have questions Love that the hotel is brand new only 2 years old I hope the management maintains the standards of service and care delivered for the years to come

Wow the whole experience was amazing from the day we stepped in this hotel They upgraded us to a suite because we were on our honeymoon Everything was perfect They even offer a free snack buffet from the noon till midnight This hotel is a top one on my list for Barcelona

Negative_Review: No late checkout allowed as much as I asked it seems staff are not bothered with anyone who requests a late checkout Another time staff were unprofessional as you can hear their loud voices and laughter as we sat in the restaurant
Positive_Review: The location is amazing and the room is top notch

Negative_Review: Can hear feel the underground metro passing under the building Toilet orientation washing sink is outside separate
Positive_Review: Good staff They have a good complimentary snack bar from 14 00 till 00 00 Clean Great location Fast Wifi

Negative_Review: I needed double which I got 2 twin beds which was attached and moving while sleeping the rooms where not soundproof you can hear the sound from the passage but all other facilities where perfect
Positive_Review: No Positive

We would like to say Roger all the staff were amazing nothing was a problem to them we can also say hand on heart every thing about this hotel was perfect we have visited Barcelona a few times this has been far the best hotel we have stayed in WELL DONE TO YOU ALL

Negative_Review: Bath robes would have been a nice touch
Positive_Review: We liked the large bedroom which had a spacious wet room The hotel is only two years old beautifully designed we loved the decor

Location is perfect staff very friendly room clean and very comfortable quiet facing the rear of the hotel above the pool From 14 00 until midnight there are free snacks which were perfect as a light meal Very easy to reach from the airport by Aerobus 50 meters from the hotel
Everything The location the rooms were spacious and beautifully decorated we had a balcony that overlooked the square the soundproofing in the hotel was excellent the small pool area lovely

Negative_Review: Rooms at the ffront are on a noisy street too loud to open door to balcony
Positive_Review: Close to all attractions Helpful staff we had s problem with our bathroom and were offered another room without any fuss Complimentary snacks made the hotel feel more like home
Everything in particular ALL the staff are on your side They went the extra mile when I needed help I cannot speak highly enough of the service

Negative_Review: Some evening buffet items are quite often empty But notify the staff and they put it right This buffet is a part of the room rate and it ought to keep the same standard as the rooms which means it s items should be available during all the lounge opening hours
Positive_Review: Very good noise insulated rooms vital in a noisy street comfortable and pleasant looking interior of the whole hotel and very attentive staff
The staff were simply the BEST I was upgraded to a Jnr Suite which was simply stunning They even let me stay in the room for a further 4 hours to wait for for flight

Negative_Review: The tapas is a far stretch it s like a bad afternoon tea at a YMCA But nice to have soft drinks yoghurt you can take to your room The car park is for lack of a better word tiny Unless you have a fiat or smaller aka moped bicycle your car won t fit underground But I m nit picking as I expect from a good review Had nothing to actually really effect your stay
Positive_Review: Location right in the heart of barcelona Room nice

Negative_Review: It was quite expensive and some staff in the restaurant were rather brusque I expect very high standards when paying that price for a hotel and a little more courtesy from waiting staff would have made our stay even more enjoyable
Positive_Review: Fantastic high spec facilities in room brilliant central location The bed was one of the most comfortable I have had in a hotel and the shower was wonderful Also loved the plunge pool

Negative_Review: Frequent vibration from the underground metro even on the higher floors
Positive_Review: Excellent location Friendly and helpful staff Free hotel snacks 2pm to midnight

Negative_Review: I would have liked the bar soap to be a little larger and would have liked a wash cloth along with towels but I think this would have been provided if I had asked
Positive_Review: The staff was very welcoming and efficient They responded quickly to give us information when asked and kind service Our room was excellent spacious and even had a trunk to store our luggage The location was perfect We enjoyed having snacks provided after 2PM although it was more than just snacks

Negative_Review: The bar area could have been more cozy
Positive_Review: 2 metrostops within a 200 meter walk Right in the middle of all the interesting neighbourhoods so very walkable in all directions Excellent spacious room beds shower and soundproofing Not a sound to be heard from the traffic noise on the busy road in front Extra bonus is the afternoon and evening free buffet with a salad pasta sandwiches cakes and non alcoholic drinks Very helpful staff
Gorgeous room large comfy bed the best shower had for sometime huge cubicle very powerful Afternoon snacks where a lovely touch All the staff were very friendly helpful

Negative_Review: The cleaning of the room was poor Check under your bed and you will see a layer of dust
Positive_Review: Hotel was nice It s very well located The staff was Professional

We were very satisfied with the hotel the staff is very friendly the location is excellent and the room looks exactly as on the pictures The room has everything that you need for a couple of days and it was perfectly clean Air condition works very well The bed was extra confortable I would definately suggest to choose this hotel if you prefer to stay in a good hotel for a bit higher price but knowing that you will spend quality time there

Negative_Review: The open bathroom didn t bother us but might some people wanting more privacy
Positive_Review: Good location for sightseeing although on busy street But rooms soundproof Efficient friendly staff nice breakfast and free daytime light buffet Recommended
Fabulous hotel Great location Junior suite with pool is a must Amazing views great food and staff are very helpful Reasonable bar prices lovely snack bar free 2pm midnight

Amazing hotel in the heart of Barcelona Everything was perfect the room staff breakfast and buffet Staff is very helpful and professional rooms are very clean breakfast is very delicious Great location It is possible to get to every spot in the city Definitely will stay in Hotel Catalonia Square again

Negative_Review: Builders opposite all weekend nice pool on balcony but frosted glass would offer some privacy whilst bathing
Positive_Review: Enjoyed all of my stay except lack of privacy on balcony food room and service excellent

Negative_Review: Ran out of white wine in the bar
Positive_Review: The friendliness and professionalism of the staff The location was excellent being very central but the hotel itself was quiet

Negative_Review: Recommend not to parfume hallways as it triggers allergy
Positive_Review: Excellent location and breakfast Great to have free buffet from 14 00 to midnight so you may have a light dinner if you are too tired to dine out Quite clean and helpfull personel

Located just a short stroll from Plaza Catalunya for those who take Aerobus from the airport very convenient Staffs were friendly and helpful with any enquiry you may have Complimentary bottles of water snack from 2pm to midnight and good night chocolate everyday El Corte Ingles dept store just across the road and many more shops along Passeig de Gracia are all within walking distance Metro stations are also nearby
Perfect location friendly helpful staff clean rooms beautifully decorated Lovely hotel looked after us very well when our flight was cancelled couldn t fault them
The staff was wonderful always willing to answer all of our questions and gave us some recommendations when we needed them Snack Bar was great cleaning location and everything

Negative_Review: TV not clear Dining area staff not always friendly Told we could not eat snacks in the lounge area yet other guests were allowed to eat there
Positive_Review: Great location afternoon snacks shower and good breakfast
The location was perfect within walking distance of so many things The friendliness and helpfulness of the staff was top notch The room was very nice and the bed was comfy

Negative_Review: Some staff a little abrupt Wine stocks were very low Bathroom wasn t private enough for my liking and if light was switched on during the night it would disturb my husband as it lit up the room The water bottles in room were far too small
Positive_Review: Location was good Our room was quiet at the back of property Buffet was good
The staff were very helpful and friendly The amenities were very good I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends and family Had the most wonderful stay
Excellent localization and personal Near the Aerobus 50 m from to airport The free beverages and snacks salad sandwich etc are very comfortable

Negative_Review: Should Ipod dock had lightning connector it would be very convenient for mobile charging It is very minor issue though
Positive_Review: Good location just a few minutes walk from to airport bus terminal located on city center Friendly and helpful staff with good service Clean and spacious room with good facility Guest lounge is availale until midnight for some finger foods and soft drinks Definately return there on next trip

We found very well at the hotel We had a nice room on the calm backside of the house Breakfast was very good Also the possibility to have a snack in the afternoon and evening The position of the hotel is fantastic we could do the most of our sightseeing walking directly from the hotel to the old city All the busses are close to the hotel Also the transfer to the airport was very good by bus

Negative_Review: That i must to leave from Catalonia square
Positive_Review: It is an excellent hotel the best choice to stay in Barcelona very clean the staff very helpful always with a smile the room is very beautiful specially i want to thank Raul and Alejo I they are always near to us in any problem

Very helpful staff And most importantly genuinely friendly As a regular customer I received a late check out free of charge I travel a lot but I rarely encounter such a warm customer care Room is comfortable enough shelves to place things Breakfast is gorgeous I enjoyed the stay at this hotel

Negative_Review: English breakfast tea was not very nice bit too weak but I am English
Positive_Review: Staff really helpful and friendly location great Breakfast great choice clean and comfy room Excellent extras of free buffet from 2pm to midnight so great for a milkshake after a long working day

Negative_Review: Breakfast expensive didn t try it for that reason as there are reasonable alternatives close by
Positive_Review: Wonderful staff so friendly Rooms were clean and modern Nice quality coffee machine provided with free coffee Free afternoon evening buffet surprisingly good quality and a good money saver if you re on a budget

Negative_Review: Slight noise from metro but not too disturbing Did not try the breakfast as we were put off by the 19 euro price lots of alternatives nearby
Positive_Review: Staff very friendly and helpful Good standard of comfort throughout
Everything but mainly staff hospitality and location They offer snacks and coffee from 2pm to midnight free of charge which was very convenient Also late check out options up to 6 pm with proper cost

Catalonia Square 4 Sup is a nice modern hotel location is very convenient very close to the main attractions but on a quiet street the stuff is very friendly and helpful they gave me very good advice about where to eat and it was fantastic best routes to get to different places at the best price the hotel is clean So I can say they did their best to make my staying there pleasant and comfortable
We loved everything about this hotel Starting with its location which is superb the staff that was very helpful and breakfast which was outstanding The free afternoon buffe was another plus

The room was fabulous bed so comfortable Sound proof room was fantastic as I am a very light sleeper best sleep in years Staff were very friendly helpful Free Snacks during the day was great after a day sightseeing Would have liked if there was indoor pool

Negative_Review: Toilet shower are 2 separate rooms but washbasin is open and part of the room limiting privacy Was a big issue for us but can be a bit awkward
Positive_Review: Spacious rooms well equipped in a great location Aerobus stops 300m from the hotel making getting to and from the airport real convenient In the middle of town many restaurants around A nice touch is the free 2PM midnight open buffet with soft drinks juices small bites salads and fruit

Everything Quiet good location fantastic service and to top it off the complimentary snacks from 2pm to midnight enable us to replenish our energy after hours of walking and continue our program until we had chance for late dinner Fabulous hotel Wished we had stayed there earlier and longer

Negative_Review: Availability of bathrobes and room slippers would have been a nice extra touch
Positive_Review: Helpful and friendly staff Staff conversant in English Great location Modern clean room that is remarkably quiet Generous afternoon and evening snacks
1 Perfect location 1 min to the aerobus stop Near to the main sightseeing and shopping spots 2 Very helpful staffs with qualitied services 3 Spacial room 4 Supper bar is definitely a plus

Negative_Review: Somehow electricity didn t charge my phones and I had to charge it through plugging usb cable to the tv and turn the tv on so it charges the phone Doing this for 3 days was a bit hectic and not practical Looks like electricity in the hotel isn t sufficient enough Also the toilet didn t work properly
Positive_Review: The modern feel of the hotel A great location since a city like Barcelona has a lot to do in different areas Close to metro station

Negative_Review: The quality fir money of the breakfast was pretty low
Positive_Review: Very comfortable rooms and beds lovely new hotel friendly staff and great to have the snack bar
Location Personal very nice Comfortable rooms bathroom Big terasse 8th floor nice view to Tibidabo Good breakfast Tapas for free in the afternoon

Everything Starting with The wonderful aroma of the Hotel the people in the reception area WONDERFUL The room very clean GREAT BREAKFAST and service inside the restaurant Great waiters And excellent location Perfect choice
Fantastic location Spacious rooms Excellent team who want to assist in every way Great breakfast and snacks offered in the afternoon evening in a very relaxing dining sitting area
The staff is very friendly and willing to help breakfest excellent Big rooms xxl shower Free buffet from 2 pm for hotel guests location superb just 20 seconds off catalunia

Negative_Review: BREAKFAST starts from 07 30 Too late if you need to arrive to convention center at 08 30 which is one hour ride by trains and shuttle buss No flexibility about this by stuff Nice to have a lounge during the day but the same snacks every day and stuff there could be more friendly Room designed with no privacy if you are not staying alone
Positive_Review: Location Lounge

We loved everything about this hotel The location was excellent and centrally located to access all areas in Barcelona The staff were incredible from the moment we checked in The Junior Suite was very nice and had a Nespresso machine The snack buffet from 2 PM to Midnight daily is a really nice touch

Excellent location Staff wonderful and helpful Breakfast bar and daytime snacks coffee etc was a great part of the hotel Highly recommend Right near the Hop On Off Blue Red Bus At Catalonia Square s nearby restaurants and shopping Wonderful

Negative_Review: Nothing really Frequent but brief vibrations from the underground trains is a minor inconvenience
Positive_Review: Fantastic location with Placa Catalunya La Rambla shops restaurants tour buses on your doorstep Warm welcoming staff esp Kenia Comfortable spacious tastefully furnished rooms Free snacks decent selection for all guests from 1400 midnight is unique Very good breakfast Free WiFi A great hotel by any standards extraordinary for Europe An amazing stay at an amazing hotel
Perfect location Very clean and very quiet because of good isolation of windows Delicious breakfast and also snacks sandwiches soup drinks etc included from 2pm to 12pm Very nice staff

From the minute we arrived at the hotel the staff gave us excellent attention Plenty of local information was provided on our check in with a detailed discussion about Barcelona and a map where everything was in relation to the hotel Staff could not have been more helpful to us Our room was a junior suite on the 6th floor It was spacious comfortable quiet and spotlessly clean Having complimentary food available for all guests from 12md onwards on level one was most appreciated We had a lovely relaxing time in Barcelona thank you
Fantastic location great hotel Staff friendly and always happy to help Hotel clean snacks available all day which was a great bonus Fantastic buffet style breakfast great choice of food

Just off of Catalonia Square this location can t be beat You can take the bus from BCN right to the square and the hotel is about 1 2 block away from the bus stop Our room opened onto a nice balcony that looked down the street to the fountain in the square The lounge was fabulous with the best breakfast in the AM and a bar with bartender in the PM The hotel finishes were contemporary and it appeared to be new or newly renovated Very nice

Negative_Review: view from the window size and opening times of the fitness room
Positive_Review: Great location modern comfortable room nespesso coffee machine helpful staff great cheesecake at the snack bar

It is the best location you can walk to most of the attractions The staff provided excellent services most helpful and always with a smile Thank you Kenia and Joan for your wonderful services The hotel is spotless very tastefully decorated The rooms are good size we had 3 rooms the ones facing the street are bigger and have a balcony with a nice view The double glass windows kept the noise out The free snack bar 2 pm to midnight is actually at the hotel s breakfast dinning area tables were always set with napkins and cutlery also many varieties of beverage and snacks to choose from an oasis after long and busy day tours McDonald Starbucks supermarket pharmacy and family restaurant are just a few doors away Hop on off buses are 2 blocks from the hotel My family enjoyed our 3 night stay at this wonderful boutique hotel and highly recommend it to all travelers visiting Barcelona Everything is just excellent
The overall experience was a pleasure The staff were excellent and genuine Their policy of free water in your room daily and free snacks from Midday till Midnight is a great selling point

Negative_Review: We liked the attitude helpfulness and kindness of the staff nothing was too much trouble The Hotel was extremely clean and the rooms very comfortable with absolutely first class facilities The food was excellent and the choice of food was fresh varied and plentiful No complaints from any of us
Positive_Review: The location of the Hotel was very convenient for everything we needed

Staff was very pleasant and helpful location was convenient for sightseeing and train and bus transportation including the bus to the airport Very impressed by the thoroughness of the accommodations everything had been considered by the designers including a built in adapter in the safe for electronic devices which I particularly appreciated since I had unintentionally left my European adapter at another hotel Also liked the firm mattress on the bed Afternoon buffet at no charge was a delightful surprise

Negative_Review: Need some English tea bags as the one s at the hotel are not very nice for us English We love our tea The other thing is maybe a couple of mugs in the room for a larger cup of tea Minor things really
Positive_Review: This hotel is one of the best I have ever stayed in The staff are very friendly and helpful They put a buffet on from 12 noon until midnight The rooms are immaculate and very well thought out Love the magnifying mirror with light Would definitely recommend

The location is perfect just at the corner of the Passage de Gracia walking distance to everywhere Subway is just at the corner of the street Restaurant n cafes r all nearby The staffs r nice n friendly There s a snack from 2pm till midnight We can always have a drink fruit or snack after a long day journey before back to our rooms

Negative_Review: Breakfast is very good but need more diversification between the days
Positive_Review: Great accommodation well equipped facility we didn t have time to see the pool nor the fitness center Very good WiFi Excellent location Staff is very helpful Nice refreshment during all the day

Perfect location We drove down and were able to use the onsite secure parking at a very fair price The staff were very knowledgable and friendly We liked the idea of being able to sit in the lounge relaxing and having snacks drinks free from the maddening crowd I would recommend this boutique hotel

All the staff were friendly and helpful to the maximum they all took the extra mile to attend to anything you ask for even if it is out of their scope for the money i paid to get this beautiful room with a private pool is nothing

I loved everything about this hotel I moved here from a 5 hotel and it was way better on every level The staff were pleasant helpful and very friendly The location was wonderful central and easily accessible The pool though small is nice and the afternoon snacks are a nice touch for guests Most importantly the rooms are very very clean and bright I am fussy about hotels especially bathrooms but was very very pleased with this hotel
Everything Location was excellent Staff were all helpful and friendly Rooms were lovely clean and modern It was just fantastic

Negative_Review: Not a lot of privacy with bathroom facilities
Positive_Review: Fabulous location for sightseeing shopping and transport The Buffett provided for free from 2pm until 10pm was very welcome after a long day sightseeing
Hotel staff excellent friendly and helpful Very clean mini buffet and breakfast very good room and necessities excellent Free wifi worked well Great location

Staff was exceptional Our room was unbelievable and had its own small pool on the balcony They had a wonderful free buffet from 2 00pm on in the afternoon This was great with our kids who were always hungry and needed a snack The location was great The staff went out of their way to help in any way they could Would stay their again in a heartbeat

The hotel is extremely well located and central to everything Just steps away from Pla a de Catalunya it was easy to get to from the airport using the Aerobus just 5 90 person each way The staff was amazing Each staff members were so nice and helpful and went out of their ways to make us comfortable The rooms were very clean comfortable and quiet I would highly recommend and will definetely stay there again if I ever come back to Barcelona

Great location very close to airport bus metro as well as many attractions Staff very helpful the buffet they provide for free from 2 in the afternoon to midnight everyday was very handy as well as tasty

Negative_Review: The separation of breakfast from the stay Strange
Positive_Review: All great The separation of breakfast from the stay was insusual which encouraged us to eart out Always s good move in Barcelona

The staff The rooms are so clean and modern the buffet The best hotel ever Great location clean and modern rooms all the workers are so nice and service oriented we arrived at night we didn t get out of the cab and the bell boy run out to us and ask if we are guests of the hotel took our valises and wait with us to the quick check in came with us to the room and didn t leave us until he explained us all about the room and the hotel Joan from the reception help us with all our questions all the workers are so nice there The room were cleaned twice a day in the evening chocolate near the bed in our last day the bell boy run out in the rain to stop us a cab Excellent staff
The Location central to the shopping and the buzz of the city the snacks and soft drinks in the afternoon and evening a great idea for after a weary day exploring the city

Could not have been a better hotel for my family of 6 including older children and grandmother Sleek very clean modern with large lounge dining area all day buffet great for hungry tourists breaking schedules in the warm weather Location just off Catalunya Square at the top of Las Ramlas and bordering the Gothic quarter is terrific lots to do especially for history arts buffs within 20 minutes strolling in all directions Free walking tours offered a big plus Many hotel choices in the city look no further than this hotel

Negative_Review: The staff was not so friendly Early check in was not possible even with additional payment the one of the best rooms of the hotel had teo separate single beds this was horrible The hotel reserved the amount on credit card two times
Positive_Review: We have a room with small pool and nice view Very good location

Excellent location friendly staff free buffet in the afternoon and evening is wonderful if you arrive late or just feel like a snack Comfortable rooms No noise at all from the street thanks to double windows

Negative_Review: that the taxi cab ordered to take a family to the airport disappointed both the hotel as well a us the hotel was kind enough to credit the cost of the second cab
Positive_Review: We like the attentiveness of the staff We would recommend this hotel to anyone with older children

Location was great near everything but still quiet enough Room was very clean and comfy Pool area was small but did it s job well We also liked the open snack buffet it was very easy to grab a free bite whenever on need except in the mornings
Excellent location Very helpful staff and particularly Adria and Kenya at reception Went out of their way to ensure we have all we need Many thanks Will definitely be staying again

Negative_Review: Painfully slow front desk on check in Poorly equipped gym Small shaded pool area is not for lounging
Positive_Review: Great location Modern and clean hotel Good sized room with very nice bathroom facilities Complimentary afternoon snacks a nice touch Plunge pool appreciated on a hot day

Negative_Review: Toilet without locks Travelled with kids can t have lone time in toilet without kids budging in because no locks
Positive_Review: The location location location

The attention to details from the welcome basket to the cleanliness the pool the staff the decor the location I wanted to stay longer
